value.title: The wrong answers to 30 common Power BI interview questions 2022
value.excerpt: There are multiple websites that offer Power BI interview questions and answers and after reviewing them, I have collected 30 common Power BI interview questions that have wrong answers and together we will figure out what the right answer is.  Join me and lets clarify those topics once and for all!

value.title: Can you refresh a single table in Power BI?
value.excerpt: Frustrated that a you can only do a full refresh? Patrick takes it to the next level by showing how you can refresh only a single table in your Power BI dataset. This is a great option for targeted refresh and avoid potential overhead. value.title: Power BI Apps and App Workspaces: How to distribute Power BI content to a Large Audience
value.excerpt: Power BI Apps are a terrific way to distribute your Power BI content to a large audience.  You can "Publish App" to Entire Organization or specific individuals and groups. Then any user (within the Group you provided Access to) can click "Get Apps" to consume your App - which comprises the Dashboards,
